QuestData.Title: Ally of the Netherwing
QuestData.Description: Allow me to return you to Mordenai. I am certain that he wishes to see you once more.
QuestData.LogDescription: Let Karynaku return you to Mordenai in the Netherwing Fields.
QuestData.RewardText: You have proven yourself as an ally of the Netherwing. My mother is free and my brothers and sisters are saved!$B$BPerhaps someday, we will call for you again. When that day comes, know that you will be welcomed with open arms - a $g brother:sister; to the Netherwing Dragonflight.
